titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the Queenes Maiestie, by the reuerende Father in God the Bishop of Chichester, at Grenewiche, the 14. day of Marche. 1573. Seene and allowed according to the order appoynted
Sermon preached before the Queenes Majestie.
titleStmt.author: Curteys, Richard, 1532?-1582.
Browne, Thomas, ca. 1535-1585.

publicationStmt.publisher: Dy [sic] Henry Binneman, for Francis Coldocke,

notesStmt.note: The name of the editor, Thomas Browne, appears on A2r.
Running title reads: A godly sermon preached at Grenewiche.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
